MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH4 postcode area of Penyffordd affecting properties in Abbotts Lane, Fairview, Rhos Avenue and surrounding area. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:30am on 22nd December 2020.
